metadata.title: Prospectus : Société de correspondance nationale.
metadata.creator: Charon, François, fl. 1790-1821
Baudouin, François-Jean, 1759-1838, publisher
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez Baudouin, imprimeur de l'Assemblée nationale, rue du Foin-Saint-Jacques, no. 31,
metadata.description: Signed: Charon, président de la fédération, Cornu, président du comité de la fédération, Broquin, commissaire
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Letter of transmittal (p. [1] first sequence) signed in ms.: Cornu, Broquin
On establishing an organization to publish lists of electoral candidates and government proceedings
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text.
